TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StylusEventHandler(object sender, StylusEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StylusEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StylusEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StylusEventArgs)
public delegate void StylusEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StylusEventArgs ^ e);
type StylusEventHandler = delegate of obj * StylusEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: 表示方法，這個方法處理與實作 介面之類別關聯的手寫筆事件。

span.span: Represents the method that handles a stylus event for a class that the implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用指定的處理常式的委派事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the delegate to designate a handler for the event.
